hero.description: Record Teams, Google Meet or Zoom calls — even with earbuds — and instantly get a <1>transcription</1> and <2>summary</2>.

recorder.step1: Click <1>Start Recording</1> — a browser popup appears
recorder.step4: Start your meeting and record — stop when done
recorder.desktopInstructions: If you use Teams or Zoom via the <1>desktop app</1>:
recorder.desktopStep2: Check <1>Share system audio</1> ON — this captures the app's audio
recorder.desktopStep3: Make sure you use <1>speakers</1> (not earbuds!) so the mic also records your voice
recorder.desktopTip: Using earbuds/headset? Join the meeting via browser (teams.microsoft.com or zoom.us) for best quality.
recorder.participantsDesc: Add names for better speaker recognition
recorder.participantsNote: Empty fields will be automatically numbered (Speaker 1, Speaker 2, etc.)
recorder.notifyDesc: Plays notification: "This call is being recorded (audio only)"
recorder.processingTime: This may take 30-60 seconds for long conversations...
recorder.transcriptionLanguageDesc: Language of the meeting being recorded

errors.microphoneAccess: No microphone access. Check your browser settings.
errors.recordingCancelled: Recording cancelled. You MUST check 'Share system audio'.
errors.noSystemAudio: No system audio detected! Choose 'Entire Screen' and check 'Share audio'.

dashboard.title: My Transcriptions
dashboard.noTranscriptionsDesc: Make a new recording to generate your first transcription

login.title: Meeting Notes AI
login.loginDesc: Log in to manage your transcriptions
login.checkEmail: Check your email for the confirmation link!
login.haveAccount: Already have an account? Log in

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: Meeting Notes AI is a service of <1>Prim Automation</1>, based in the Netherlands. We are responsible for processing your personal data as described in this privacy policy.
privacy.section2Intro: We collect and process the following data:
privacy.section3Title: 3. What do we use your data for?
privacy.section4Title: 4. Who do we share your data with?
privacy.section4Intro: We share your data with the following parties to provide our service:
privacy.sccsNote: <1>SCCs</1> = Standard Contractual Clauses, approved by the European Commission for international data transfers.
privacy.section5Title: 5. How long do we keep your data?
retentionItems: <1>Transcriptions:</1> Until you delete them, or until you delete your account
<1>Audio recordings:</1> Deleted after processing (not permanently stored)
<1>Account data:</1> Until you delete your account
privacy.retentionNote: When you delete your account, all your data is automatically and permanently deleted.
privacy.section6Intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights: <1>Access:</1> You can request which data we have about you
<1>Correction:</1> You can have incorrect data corrected
<1>Deletion:</1> You can have your data deleted
<1>Portability:</1> You can request your data in a readable format
<1>Objection:</1> You can object to certain processing
privacy.rightsContact: To exercise your rights, contact us at
privacy.section7Intro: We take the security of your data seriously:
securityItems: Access to data is limited to authorized users
We use Row-Level Security at database level
privacy.section8Intro: We do <1>not use tracking cookies</1>. We do use local storage in your browser for:
storageItems: Session information to keep you logged in
privacy.storageNote: This is necessary for the service to function.
privacy.section9Content: <1>Note:</1> When you record meetings, you are responsible for informing other participants. In the Netherlands, recording conversations you participate in is allowed, but it's good practice to inform participants. Our app offers an optional audio notification for this.
privacy.section10Content: We may change this privacy policy. For significant changes, we will inform you via the app or email. The date at the top indicates when this policy was last modified.
privacy.section11Content: If you have a complaint about how we handle your data, you can contact us. You also have the right to file a complaint with your local data protection authority.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.section1Content: By using Meeting Notes AI ("the Service"), you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, do not use the Service.
terms.section2Intro: Meeting Notes AI is an online tool that allows you to:
section2Items: Record audio from meetings via your browser
terms.section3_1Content: To use the Service, you must log in with a Google account. You are responsible for keeping your account credentials confidential.
terms.section3_2Content: You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. Report unauthorized use to us immediately.
terms.section4Intro: You agree that you will <1>not</1> use the Service for:
section4Items: Illegal activities or activities that violate the law
Recording conversations without participants' knowledge where legally required
Distributing harmful, threatening, or discriminatory content
terms.section5Important: <1>Important:</1> You are responsible for complying with laws and regulations when recording conversations.
section5Items: Inform participants that you are recording (our app offers an option for this)
Do not use recordings for unauthorized purposes
terms.section6_1Content: The Service, including all software, design, and documentation, is owned by Prim Automation and is protected by intellectual property rights.
terms.section6_2Content: You retain all rights to the content you upload (audio, transcriptions). By using the Service, you grant us a limited license to process your content to provide the Service.
terms.section7Intro: We strive for high availability but cannot guarantee that the Service will always be available. We reserve the right to:
section7Items: Temporarily suspend the Service for maintenance
Terminate the Service with reasonable notice
terms.section8Intro: To the extent permitted by law:
section8Items: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind
We are not liable for indirect damage, consequential damage, or lost profits
Our total liability is limited to the amount you have paid us in the past 12 months (if applicable)
terms.section9Intro: Transcriptions and summaries are generated by AI (Google Gemini). While we strive for accuracy:
section9Items: You should always verify important information
terms.section9Note: We are not liable for decisions made based on AI-generated content.
terms.section10Intro: We may terminate your access to the Service if you violate these terms. You may delete your account at any time. Upon termination:
section10Items: All your data will be permanently deleted
You will lose access to stored transcriptions
terms.section11Content: We may change these terms. For significant changes, we will inform you via the app or email. Continued use after changes means you accept the new terms.
terms.section12Content: These terms are governed by Dutch law. Disputes will be submitted to the competent court in the Netherlands.
terms.section13Intro: For questions about these terms, you can contact:
section14Items: <1>Severability:</1> If a provision is invalid, the remaining provisions remain in force.
<1>Entire agreement:</1> These terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us.
<1>No waiver:</1> Not enforcing a right does not mean we waive that right.

transcriptionPrompt.participantsCount: There are {{count}} participants in this conversation:
transcriptionPrompt.useExactNames: USE THESE EXACT NAMES as speaker labels!
transcriptionPrompt.maxVoices: The number of unique voices on the RIGHT channel is at most {{count}}.
transcriptionPrompt.speaker: Speaker {{index}}

notificationAudio.message: Attention: this conversation is being recorded. Audio only, no video.
